channel.title: Progress Report 1 - InsAne - Pkz v.1
channel.description:
[center][size=6][font=trebuchet ms][b]InsAne - Pkz[/b][/font][/size] [size=1][font=trebuchet ms][b]Version V.1[/b][/font][/size]
[hr] [/center][center] [/center][center]First and foremost, This server is based apon the old WinterLove v.3,
- It's currently still a work in progess, Adding new things here and there...[/center][center]My goal is to slowly build up one of the greatest pking server in histroy, Bringing back the old runescape spirit.[/center][center]Secondary goals - Making the server lag-free, Brilliant econemy and awsome combat (npc-wise)[/center][center] [/center][center] [hr] [/center][center][b][/b] [/center][center][b][size=4][font=trebuchet ms]Featurs:[/font][/size][/b][/center][center][b][/b] [/center][center]Incredible new Bone-Grinding system,[/center][center]new Ancient Altar functions,[/center][center]PKING is EVERYWERE! (but home, and train),[/center][center]Fixed NPC clipping[/center][center]excellent SYI protection[/center][center] [/center][center] [hr] [/center][center] [/center][center][b][size=4][font=trebuchet ms]Pictures:[/font][/size][/b][/center][center][b][/b] [/center][center][URL=http://img401.imageshack.us/i/56146889.png/][IMG]http://img401.imageshack.us/img401/3551/56146889.png[/img][/URL][/center][center] [/center][center] [/center][center] [/center][center] [/center][center]More pictures to come[/center]

item.title: Progress Report 1 - InsAne - Pkz v.1

This server is based apon the old WinterLove v.3,
[/quote]
nice man pretty epic, im working with an old whitescape currently, put me down for beta?[/quote]

lol, Nice man…

  • And thanks

Good luck with your source
